Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ExecuteSQLFile(SQLFilePath) means by pass all SQL Queries above and execute the sql file

Keyword.Name: SelectDateTimeAccountEndOfDay
Keyword.Description: Go to tab End of day report, select date time and account code

Param.Name: sProvider
Param.Description: Comdata or WEX, will selected correct tab, must provide

Param.Name: sDate
Param.Description: Format: M/d/yyyy, null mean by pass select date, let it default value

Param.Name: sVCAccount
Param.Description: VCard Account need to select, select by contains, null means by pass select

Param.Name: sExpectedBankAccount
Param.Description: Verify Bank Account Name of selected VCard, null means by pass verify

Keyword.Name: VerifyEODReport_AccountBalance

Param.Description: VCard Account need to select, verify by contains

Param.Name: sAccountBalance
Param.Description: Input Amount for verify, null means by pass verify

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)

Keyword.Name: FilterSearchPage
Keyword.Description: Filter transaction - Will click on search button and set filter set (Images\Customer\Search\1.png)

Param.Name: sTransactionType
Param.Description: Select Transaction Type | Payables Invoices | Payments | Any

Param.Name: sFieldName
Param.Description: Field name need to filter

Param.Name: sOperator
Param.Description: Operator =|Range|...

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Default Value Input - Date time with format MMddyyyy

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Second Value use in case of sOperator is RANGE - Date time with format MMddyyyy

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: SearchButton(disable) means verify this button is disable or not

Keyword.Description: Select a Transaction in Search Page, you should use keyword FilterInSearchPage before using this keyword (Images\Customer\Search\3.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Select Transaction base on its order, null means by pass it

Param.Name: sTransactionName
Param.Description: Select base on Payment Number, null means by pass

Keyword.Name: VerifyPaymentPropertiesFromSearchPage
Keyword.Description: Verify Properties of a Payment from Search page

Param.Name: sPropertyName
Param.Description: Name of property need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - null means by pass verify, in case of you just need to use sOptional

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - With Property Name Type is Date Format: keyword will verify by contains not full string - null means empty

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: Expected result true|false

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClickLastCardActivity(true) - it will click on the link of Last Card Activity, ClickBatchID(true) - it will click on the link of Batch ID, DownloadFileName(true) - it will click on the link of FileName for downloading file

Param.Name: sCCExpires
Param.Description: Verify Expire Date MM/YY

Param.Name: sCCStatus
Param.Description: Verify Current status of Credit Card

Param.Name: sVerifyButton
Param.Description: Verify button(s) are displayed on Credit Card Image

Param.Name: sClickButton
Param.Description: Click and do process on button from Credit Card Image

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: DONOTCLOSE(true) to keep in Virtual Card Activity screen

Param.Name: sCancelAsNormal
Param.Description: boolean: true will select this option, false will select the remain option, or null will leave it as default

Param.Name: sCancelAndReIssue
Param.Description: boolean: true will select this option, false will select the remain option, or null will leave it as default

Param.Name: sPayeeEmail
Param.Description: IF Email form is disabled: do verify, ELSE: perform adding value

Param.Name: sPayeeEmailCC
Param.Description: IF Email CC form is disabled: do verify, ELSE: perform adding value

Param.Name: sVerifyMetaValue
Param.Description: Verify the form value: Bank=bankvalue|Check=checkvalue|Date=datevalue|AmountText=amttextvalue|AmountNum=amtnumvalue|PayTo=line1;line2;line3;line4;line5;line6

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: DONOTCANCEL(true) to click Do Not Cancel button|CheckCancelError(cannot cancel|has been cancelled) to verify the Error Message of Cancellation

Keyword.Name: FilterSearchPage
Keyword.Description: Filter transaction - Will click on search button and set filter set (Images\Customer\Search\1.png)

Param.Name: sTransactionType
Param.Description: Select Transaction Type | Payables Invoices | Payments | Any

Param.Name: sFieldName
Param.Description: Field name need to filter

Param.Name: sOperator
Param.Description: Operator =|Range|...

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Default Value Input - Date time with format MMddyyyy

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Second Value use in case of sOperator is RANGE - Date time with format MMddyyyy

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: SearchButton(disable) means verify this button is disable or not

Keyword.Description: Select a Transaction in Search Page, you should use keyword FilterInSearchPage before using this keyword (Images\Customer\Search\3.png)

Param.Description: Select Transaction base on its order, null means by pass it

Param.Name: sTransactionName
Param.Description: Select base on Payment Number, null means by pass

Keyword.Name: VerifyPaymentPropertiesFromSearchPage
Keyword.Description: Verify Properties of a Payment from Search page

Param.Name: sPropertyName
Param.Description: Name of property need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - null means by pass verify, in case of you just need to use sOptional

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - With Property Name Type is Date Format: keyword will verify by contains not full string - null means empty

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: Expected result true|false

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClickLastCardActivity(true) - it will click on the link of Last Card Activity, ClickBatchID(true) - it will click on the link of Batch ID, DownloadFileName(true) - it will click on the link of FileName for downloading file

Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBatchAddMultiplePayments
Keyword.Description: Create new Batch - This keyword is an enhancement of keyword EditABatch, it allow add multiple Payments (Images\Customer\Payment\.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Name: sAddPayment1
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sAddPayment2
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sAddPayment3
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sAddPayment4
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sAddPayment5
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sAddPayment6
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sAddPayment7
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sAddPayment8
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sAddPayment9
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sAddPayment10
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)

Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Name: ReplaceStringInFile
Keyword.Description: Replace String By String in a file (Images\Utils\1.png)

Param.Name: sSourceFilePath
Param.Description: Source File name need to replace string by string , LastFile() means newest File in folder AutoTest\TestData\Files\Download

Param.Name: sStringNeedToReplace
Param.Description: String need to find and replace in file

Param.Name: sNewString
Param.Description: New string need to replace string found above

Param.Name: sDestinationFilePath
Param.Description: KW will Save As new file after replace, give your out file

Keyword.Name: GenerateVCDATFile
Keyword.Description: Generate VCDAT file with data get from DB comdatatest

Param.Name: sCardID
Param.Description: CardID is required for DBqueries base

Param.Name: sRecordType
Param.Description: required: VCDAT record type: A,R,C,S,B,W

Param.Name: sTransType
Param.Description: VCDAT Transaction type: 0,5,6,8

Param.Name: sCustBillAmount
Param.Description: required: Customer Billed Amount: the amount to affect in calculator

Param.Name: sCompCode
Param.Description: Company Code, null means auto get from DB base on sCardID

Param.Name: sAccountCode
Param.Description: Account Code, null means auto get from DB base on sCardID

Param.Name: sfilepathVCDAT
Param.Description: Save file to folder, null means Files\\Download as default, then add to buffer with param @sfilepathVCDAT@

Param.Name: sSQLConnection
Param.Description: Sql connection to customer DB

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark a comment for test step

Keyword.Name: GoToHomePage
Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Home Page

Keyword.Name: GoToSearch
Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Search Function

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: isClick(false) mean check Search Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: FilterSearchPage
Keyword.Description: Filter transaction - Will click on search button and set filter set (Images\Customer\Search\1.png)

Param.Name: sTransactionType
Param.Description: Select Transaction Type | Payables Invoices | Payments | Any

Param.Name: sFieldName
Param.Description: Field name need to filter

Param.Name: sOperator
Param.Description: Operator =|Range|...

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Default Value Input - Date time with format MMddyyyy

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Second Value use in case of sOperator is RANGE - Date time with format MMddyyyy

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: SearchButton(disable) means verify this button is disable or not

Keyword.Name: SelectTransactionInSearchPage
Keyword.Description: Select a Transaction in Search Page, you should use keyword FilterInSearchPage before using this keyword (Images\Customer\Search\3.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Select Transaction base on its order, null means by pass it

Param.Name: sTransactionName
Param.Description: Select base on Payment Number, null means by pass

Keyword.Name: VerifyPaymentPropertiesFromSearchPage
Keyword.Description: Verify Properties of a Payment from Search page

Param.Name: sPropertyName
Param.Description: Name of property need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - null means by pass verify, in case of you just need to use sOptional

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - With Property Name Type is Date Format: keyword will verify by contains not full string - null means empty

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: Expected result true|false

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClickLastCardActivity(true) - it will click on the link of Last Card Activity, ClickBatchID(true) - it will click on the link of Batch ID, DownloadFileName(true) - it will click on the link of FileName for downloading file

Keyword.Name: VerifyAndActionOnCreditCardImage
Keyword.Description: Verify and Do action on Credit Card Image from Bottom View (Images\Customer\BankAccount\78.png)

Param.Name: sCCLast4Digit
Param.Description: Verify Last 4 Digit of Card Number on Credit Card Image

Param.Name: sCCExpires
Param.Description: Verify Expire Date MM/YY

Param.Name: sCCStatus
Param.Description: Verify Current status of Credit Card

Param.Name: sVerifyButton
Param.Description: Verify button(s) are displayed on Credit Card Image

Param.Name: sClickButton
Param.Description: Click and do process on button from Credit Card Image

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: DONOTCLOSE(true) to keep in Virtual Card Activity screen

Keyword.Name: CancelCardWithIssueReplacementCheck
Keyword.Description: Verify and Do action on Cancel Card and Issue Check Dialogue (Images\Customer\Payment\CancelCardWithIssueReplacementCheck.png)

Param.Name: sPrefundOrCredit
Param.Description: Verify Cancel Card Dialogue is Prefund form or Credit form

Param.Name: sCancelAsNormal
Param.Description: boolean: true will select this option, false will select the remain option, or null will leave it as default

Param.Name: sCancelAndReIssue
Param.Description: boolean: true will select this option, false will select the remain option, or null will leave it as default

Param.Name: sPayeeEmail
Param.Description: IF Email form is disabled: do verify, ELSE: perform adding value

Param.Name: sPayeeEmailCC
Param.Description: IF Email CC form is disabled: do verify, ELSE: perform adding value

Param.Name: sVerifyMetaValue
Param.Description: Verify the form value: Bank=bankvalue|Check=checkvalue|Date=datevalue|AmountText=amttextvalue|AmountNum=amtnumvalue|PayTo=line1;line2;line3;line4;line5;line6

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: DONOTCANCEL(true) to click Do Not Cancel button|CheckCancelError(cannot cancel|has been cancelled) to verify the Error Message of Cancellation

Keyword.Name: Refresh
Keyword.Description: Refresh current page

Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Home Page

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)
